attributes.review: The app took forever to download and was super slow. I was hoping to see updated information on what  new idiotic thing trump did but instead I got some stupid stuff on how trump is handling this world situation well. Also I hated that I had to put in personal info news apps are supposed to give you news not know your personal information. After one or two days I developed a virus on my phone and it originated in the this app. It is a horrendous app. If also accessed all the personal information on my phone and I counts control what my phone was doing. At one point the screen wouldnâ€™t respond at all and my phone wouldnâ€™t charge. Also whenever I texted anyone it would say Trump 2020 my friends thought that I went crazy because they know I would never say that. Also this app uses the American flag just like the rest of trumps stuff using the American flag on t-shirts, hats, bumbler stickers, ect. which is illegal.
